text.content: MY DEAR MISS BOODLE, - I promise you the paper-knife shall go to sea with me; and if it were in my disposal, I should promise it should return with me too.

All that you say, I thank you for very much; I thank you for all the pleasantness that you have brought about our house; and I hope the day may come when I shall see you again in poor old Skerryvore, now left to the natives of Canada, or to worse barbarians, if such exist.
I am afraid my attempt to jest is rather A CONTRE-COEUR.

Good-bye - AU REVOIR - and do not forget your friend,
ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON.
